name: Kurayami
description:
In Kurayami, you take control of a group of origami, trying to get through a dark house during a stormy night. 

Avoid being exposed to the red lights, as they will burn you down to ashes ! Gather as many origami as possible before reaching the exit. 

A game made during the ENJAM 2022 on the CNAM-ENJMIN site by :

Maxime MAURIN -- Game Programmer

Robin ALONZO -- Sound Designer & Composer

Louise JANDOT DIT DANJOU -- Game Artist

Juliette COSTANZO -- UI Artist & Designer

Zoé SEMPÉ -- Game & Level Designer

Antoine BROUSSE -- Game & Level Designer
